00022 #include <cppunit/CompilerOutputter.h>
00023 #include <cppunit/extensions/TestFactoryRegistry.h>
00024 #include <cppunit/ui/text/TestRunner.h>
00025 #include <string>
00026 
00027 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00028 {
00029         // Get the top level suite from the registry
00030         CPPUNIT_NS::Test *suite = CPPUNIT_NS::TestFactoryRegistry::getRegistry().makeTest();
00031 
00032         // Adds the test to the list of test to run
00033         CPPUNIT_NS::TextUi::TestRunner runner;
00034         runner.addTest( suite );
00035 
00036         // Change the default outputter to a compiler error format outputter
00037         runner.setOutputter( new CPPUNIT_NS::CompilerOutputter( &runner.result(), std::cerr ) );
00038         // Run the test.
00039         bool wasSucessful = runner.run();
00040 
00041         // Return error code 1 if the one of test failed.
00042         return wasSucessful ? 0 : 1;
00043 }
